titles: By the Kyng and the Quene the Kyng and Quenes most excellente maiesties, vnderstandinge howe that dyuers naughty and insolent persons haue now of late attempted to make quarelles ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.
publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis,
notes: Year of publication supplied from STC (2nd ed.).
Against excessive length of rapiers, etc.
"Geuen at our manour of Grenewyche, the xvii. day of March."
